TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplatePagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示一个 字段，使用该字段可以创建自定义的分页 UI。

span.span: Represents a field that enables you to create a custom paging UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要使用户能够通过一个实现控件显示的数据页上的导航控件中显示对象接口。Use the object to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data that is displayed by a control that implements the interface. (例如，控件。)此外可以使用对象来显示有关基础数据源，例如总记录数以及当前页码的信息。(An example is the control.) You can also use the object to display information about the underlying data source, such as total number of records and the current page number. 字段具有没有内置的布局。The field has no built-in layout. 因此，必须显式创建中的布局模板。Therefore, you must explicitly create the layout in the template. 可以设置内容格式使用级联样式表 (CSS) 类或内联样式元素。You can format the content by using cascading style sheets (CSS) classes or inline style elements. 可以引用控件，其中包含通过使用对象`Container`属性。You can reference the control that contains the object by using the `Container` property. 如果想要创建绑定表达式，用于显示检索到多少条记录的、 总数的页和类似的信息，这很有用。This is useful when you want to create binding expressions to show how many records were retrieved, the total number of pages, and similar information. 这些绑定表达式可以使用的属性如控制， ， ，和。These binding expressions can use properties of the control such as , , , and . 字段提供了事件，通常用于执行某项任务中的按钮时单击模板。The field provides the event, which is typically used to perform a task when a button in the template is clicked. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加字段中控件。The following example shows how to add a field in a control. 此示例使用显示当前页码、 页、 总数和总记录数。This example uses the to display the current page number, the total number of pages, and the total number of records. 控件还包含两个字段和一个字段来显示导航控件，使用户能够分页浏览数据。The control also contains two fields and a field to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/CS/TemplatePagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/VB/TemplatePagerFieldVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用事件来执行不同的操作，具体取决于按钮中单击字段。The following example shows how to use the event to perform a different action depending on which button was clicked in a field. 此示例使用显示导航控件，使用户能够分页浏览数据。This example uses the to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/CS/OnPagerCommandCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/VB/OnPagerCommandVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数通常用于动态将字段添加到控件。This constructor is typically used to dynamically add fields to a control. 若要添加动态地为对象控件，创建一个新对象。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object. 设置其属性、 将控件添加到它，并将其添加到的字段集合控件。Set its properties, add controls to it, and then add it to the field collection for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法复制当前的属性对象传递给对象中传递`newField`参数。It is used by the method to copy the properties of the current object to the object that is passed in the `newField` parameter. ## Examples [ListView Web 服务器控件概述ListView Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b4da934-2f5e-4b5a-b03d-fca5e15f85af)

span.span: Call the base class's method so that the properties of the class are also copied.

summary.span: 处理 对象中发生的事件并执行适当的操作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the object and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法以处理中发生的事件对象时在控件内单击。It is used by the method to handle events that occur in the object when a button inside the control is clicked. 方法将调用方法，并检查属性。The method invokes the method and examines the property. 如果已更改，此方法调用方法来更新的页属性控件。If has changed, this method invokes the method to update the page properties of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnPagerCommand (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs e);

abstract member OnPagerCommand : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs -> unit override this.OnPagerCommand : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中单击一个按钮时引发事件对象。The event is raised when a button is clicked in the object. 这使您可以在每次此事件发生时执行自定义例程。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

exception.span: 没有 事件的处理程序。

span.span: There is no handler for the event.

para.span: 当您重写派生类中调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ListView Web Server Control

summary.span: 当单击 对象中的按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a button is clicked in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中单击一个按钮时引发事件对象。The event is raised when a button is clicked in a object. 这使您可以在每次此事件发生时执行自定义例程。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用事件来执行不同的操作，具体取决于按钮中单击对象。The following example shows how to use the event to perform a different action depending on which button was clicked in a object. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的页导航字段的自定义内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the pager field in a control.

value.span: 一个模板对象，它包含 控件中的页导航字段的自定义内容。

span.span: A template object that contains the custom content for the pager field in a control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义自定义用户界面 (UI) 的分页数据。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for paging data. 模板通常包含用于通过数据页上的导航控件。The template usually contains navigation controls to page through data. 此外可以用于显示有关基础数据源，例如总记录数或当前页码的信息。It can also be used to display information about the underlying data source, such as the total number of records or the current page number. 若要以声明方式创建自定义模板，将放`PagerTemplate`元素内的对象。To create a custom template declaratively, put a `PagerTemplate` element inside the object. 然后，可以添加到内容`PagerTemplate`元素。You can then add the contents to the `PagerTemplate` element. 可以引用绑定中的表达式中的控件通过使用模板`Container`属性。You can reference the control in binding expressions in the template by using the `Container` property. 此属性提供对属性的访问控件，其中包括， ，和属性。This property provides access to the properties of the control, which includes the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将控件添加到访问的属性的模板控件。The following example shows how to add controls to the template that access properties of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/CS/TemplatePagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/VB/TemplatePagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]
